maqras.text: M
Hoc revelation scripture est DEUS Almighty Omniscient
Forgiver sins acceptor repentance strict in enforcing retribution possessor totus power ibi non est alius deus Eum. To Eum est ultimate destiny
Nullus argues deus revelations absque those disbelieve! Non impressed their apparent success

Disbelieving them est people Noah multus alius opponents them! Omnis community persecuted their messenger neutralize eum. they argued falsehood defeat truth. Consequently ego punished them; quam terrible est My retribution
Sic judgment tuus Dominus iam stamped upon those disbelieve ut they est dwellers Hell

Those serve throne totus those circiter it glorify praise their Dominus believe in Eum! they ask forgiveness those believe Noster Dominus Tuus mercy Tuus knowledge encompass totus things. Forgive those repent subsequentis Tuus path spare them retribution Hell
Noster Dominus admit them gardens Eden Vos promised them ac pro righteous among their parentes conjux infans. Vos est Almighty Wise
Ac protect them falling in sin Whomever Vos protect falling in sin ut feria attained mercy Vos! Hoc est major triumph
Those disbelieve told deus abhorrence vos est et malus than tuus suus abhorrence yourselves. Vos invited believe vos chose disbelieve
They dictus Noster Dominus vos put nos decessus twice Vos dedit nos 2 vivens; nunc nos confessed noster sins est ibi any via out
Hoc est when DEUS ALONE advocated vos disbelieved when others mentioned Eum vos believed Ergo deus judgment proles; He est the Multus High the Major
He est 1 continuously shows vos His proofs sends down vos caelum provisions Unus those totally submit est able to take heed
Ergo vos devote tuus worship absolutely DEUS ALONE et si disbelievers dislike it
Possessor de highest ranks Ruler whole dominion. He sends inspiration bearing His commands to whomever He chooses His servus warn Feria de Summoning
Ut est feria when everyone completely exposed nullus de them hide anything ex DEUS! To whom belongs totus sovereignty ut feria? To DEUS 1 Supreme
Ut feria omnis anima requited whatever it earned ibi non est injustice ut feria. DEUS est efficient in reckoning
Warn them imminent feria when hearts terrified multus testimentum est remorseful. transgressors non habet friend nor intercessor obeyed
He est fully aware de quod eyes non vide everything minds conceal
DEUS SCABINUS equitably DUM idols they implore EUM NON SCABINUS anything. DEUS EST UNUS est Hearer Seer
